title: Seva - Detroit
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, American, International, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Take-out
description: Extensive menu, gluten-free menu, lunch specials, and Sunday brunch. Prices moderate to slightly higher. Located at the back of the N'Namdi Center for Contemporary Art, the restaurant entrance is on the left side of the building, follow the paved walkway. Looks over an outdoor patio; the bar has brick walls, a vaulted wooden ceiling and Jeff's hand-built birch bar. Its first location is in Ann Arbor.
